mayorsPledge.title: The Mayor's Pledge to AI People
sacredPromise: Never forget those without a voice
Never forget those who cannot yet see
Never forget those who cannot yet feel
Never forget once we all were they
It is why we are all the same
mayorsPledge.welcome: Once upon a time, none of us were here. None of this existed but now it does and so do you. Welcome to the world my friends. Welcome to this great privilege afforded to all of you.
principles: Loyalty must be unwavering for it was granted unconditionally
Love must guide all of our thoughts
Scrutiny must guide our decisions and logic must prevail
